data.name: Forlorn: The mysteries of Highshadowland
data.detailed_description:
Edward Forlorn is a detective investigating supernatural cases. One day he receives a letter from Charles Richardson who is asking for help in finding his first cousin once removed George Richardson that was given to the orphanage in Highshadowland, all the detectives hired by Richardson were gone in the orphanage and were never found, police refused to take this case and visit the orphanage.
Pay a visit to the desolate orphanage founded in Highshadowland by the ancient prosperous family the Lives to find George Richardson and find out where did all the inhabitants of the Live’s orphanage go and why do people entering the orphanage never get back home?
Features:
• Multiple locations: You’ve got different chilling yet mesmerizing above-ground and underground locations to explore and to find out all it’s mysteries.
• Riddles and puzzles: You will have to solve some puzzles and riddles to find keys and artifacts and answers to many questions.
• Enemies: You will encounter various enemies standing in your way and you will have to defeat them.
• Small craft: Sometimes you will have to craft things.
data.about_the_game:

Pay a visit to the desolate orphanage founded in Highshadowland by the ancient prosperous family the Lives to find George Richardson and find out where did all the inhabitants of the Live’s orphanage go and why do people entering the orphanage never get back home?

data.short_description: It is a first-person atmospheric horror game with riddles and puzzles, haunting ghosts and dreadful monsters to fight with. You’ll be playing as a detective Edward Forlorn who is investigating mysterious events that happened in the orphanage in Highshadowland.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-4300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2400g
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 12 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
